page.title: 10Holidays In 1945
page.content:
NEWBRIDGE IN 1945 _________________ Q.Did people go on holiday in 1945? Yes but only to Porthcawl or Barry,they used to go on a bicycle or perhaps a bus. Some went on working holidays to Kent potato picking,they would sleep and eat in the farmhouse, and get paid at the end of the week.
Q.What public transport was there? There was hardly any privately owned cars, and a few buses but there was always long queues with restrictions of 5 standing. Q.What clothes did the children wear? Clothes were very basic there were no trainers or jeans,all boys wore short trousers in school,boys went into long trousers at the age of 16, but girls were never seen in trousers, they wore gym slips.
